name: Seth Bromberg
text: Great salads and average everything else. Severs are nice but they can't wait to close the place at 9:00. Open until 10 but cleanup up, turning chairs over and turning tvs off at 900. Makes you feel like they don't want you there. Don't show up after 730 if you want to eat

name: jonathan Dudo
text: Best gf pizza in town and the vegan cheese is great!

name: Taryne Porter
text: Long story short, I placed a pick up order for a future time and it was running quite late once I arrived to pick it up. The staff working tonight at the take-out area were not only extremely nice, but one guy (and I wish I would’ve gotten …More

name: Tyler White
text: Food was incredible, service was incredible, atmosphere was absolutely amazing. Everyone who worked in this building was so nice, the paintings and sculptures were absolutely beautiful. I highly recommend the pretzel bites, they come with …More

name: Beth Hallauer
text: Kosmic Karma pizza! So yummy! Picked up the pizza so not much to say about the sit down service ir armosphere but your greeters are cute😉

name: E. W.
text: We had got the party room and it was nice and clean the food was great as always and great beer selection our two servers were awesome and attentive.

name: Thomas Overmyer
text: Pizza slice and salad for the lunch special. The crust was fantastic, as was the rest of the pizza. Wait staff extremely friendly. I'll see you again  after my next doctors appt.

name: Christina Morgenstern
text: My pizza was great and service was great. My friends lunch was forgot but they comped his meal and he was able to eat some of others food since portions are so large.

name: Jeffery Lynn
text:
Great  Food!!!!
Great pizza!!
Taylor  was are server. Her grandparents should be proud of her. She was great!!!

name: Jayson Waits
text: First time at a Mellow Mushroom! Love this location in New Albany. Really cool atmosphere! Loved the food especially the prized bits and beer cheese! Will be back again very soon!

name: Annie Haefs
text: The two stars from this review come from my server, Caleb. Without his great service, I would have wanted to leave Mellow Mushroom NA 0 stars. As soon as I walked into the restaurant, 4 hosts were laughing and talking amongst themselves, …More

name: Marc
text: I love this pizza.  Toppings are fresh and great.  The crust is the best part.  Great bar that makes a quality cocktail.  I love coming here.

name: Dan Bunyard
text: Great service as always and proper COVID precautions. Always a great stop.

name: jeffrey mook
text: Pizza was so good. Took some time for the order, but you know what they say, good things come to those who wait.

name: Nickole Iula
text: The staff is very friendly and helpful. The food is fantastic!

name: Jason Greenlese
text: Quirky yet welcoming environment. The crust is fantastic!

name: Carissa Lahrman
text: Great food. Spread out with dividers between seating. Masks are being followed.

name: Cody Hopper
text: Was told pizza would be ready in 20 min.  Apparently they forgot to put our order in so had to wait there while they made the pizza.  Was never told an accurate time of how long until the pizza was done, just kept getting lied to.  A little …More

name: shawn tilton
text: It was our first time and everything was great! The food was awesome and our server was great. We will be back !

name: Layne Dreven
text: My pizza was done 2 minutes earlier than quoted. It was hot and steamy. The manager was a sweetheart. Absolute teddy bear. If you go I recommend asking for him, will enhance your experience.

name: Amber J.
text: Pizza is so good! And the magic mushroom soup.  Yum.

name: John Materne
text: Clean place. Good vibe. Friendly staff.

name: Daniel Fraziel
text: Tasty pizza and they follow Covid health laws to a T.

name: Kenny Krempa
text: My girlfriend and I love this place .

name: Life So Lovely
text: Ordered to go from here for the first time. Friendly staff welcomed me inside the restaurant and had my food ready upon my arrival. Pickup time was accurate. They showed me my food to make sure that I was pleased with my order. The food looked great!

name: Leah DeShon
text: I tried the hoagie. Great ingredients and flavor, the bun didnt work well. It was the French bread and it was too much bread, the toppings fell out because it was sliced all the way through. I'll prob stick to pizza from now on.

name: Sandra Meyer
text: This is one of my favorite places to visit with friends. The service is always friendly & the food amazing.

name: Me Matthias
text: Fun place to eat! Atmosphere bright and rowdy, not mellow. Vegan options, yay! Extremely good food, great service. Spent around 70 dollars including drinks and tip for three people.  Will definitely return!

name: Julie Chavez
text: Great food. Great service!!

name: Vicente Panizo
text: Great place! You can’t go wrong with Mellow Mushroom. The service and atmosphere is superb. Can’t go wrong with 80’s 🎶!

name: Bob Ney
text: The pizza was great, the price was good, the service was excellent

name: Becca Fiorini
text: Delicious Pizza and good service. Can watch the kitchen make the pizzas from the majority of the tables. Family friendly. The portions are big - the calzones can easily feed two people, or allow for a second meal with the leftovers.

name: Andrew Bow
text: Mellow Mushroom is a bit hardier than your typical pizza place. The pizza is heavy and the crust is fantastic with lots of cheese. We had the veggie pizza and the pretzel bites. Veggie pizza was great but the pretzel bites were defiantly …More

name: Jacob Abramson
text: If i could rate lower i would. Carryout is a mess had to wait 30mins past my order time and the only reason i received my order was because i called again. Food was cold and very disappointing

name: John Eckman
text: The atmosphere was excellent. The customer service was exceptional. I had a BYO Burger for the 1st time and it was juicy and flavorful. Of course the Pizza is always spectacular.

name: Scott B
text: One of the best for local pizza!

name: Ruth Flores
text: One of my favorites. Is really tasty and affordable for those big slices, they have a lunch special for $12 (two slices and a beer/soda). If you like good pizza this is one of those places around DTLA that you must go,seriously!

name: Carl Compton
text: Tonight was the first time i had pizza, and calzone from mellow mushroom.    It was the best i have had in a very long time. Lots of cheese, meats, and the dipping sauce was outstanding.  Finally found a pizza place that I will visit more often.   Thanks for the great food.

name: Warren Carlton
text: Service has been great. House Salad & the balsamic vinegarette dressing were very good.  And the small (10") Veg-Out pizza was tasty. I would recommend they don't stretch the dough as thin in the middle and less on the edge. The fireplace was a nice fearure to sit next to.

name: david wilkins
text: I'm sorry to pay extra take for example black olives and it's almost $3 more. You think you get more then 15 little slices..

name: Katie Kopp
text: Good food. Fun atmosphere. Amazing variety of pizzas! I recommend one of the specialty pies but if you're not feeling adventurous, they have a Build Your Own option. They also have great sandwiches. Made fresh with fresh ingredients. The slices of avacado on my club were beautiful!

name: Jody Anderson
text: One of the best pizzas I've ever eaten in Ohio!  And great service as well!  Bathrooms were sparkling clean - something I really appreciate in a restaurant.

name: Matt Yankie
text: Great pizza and great beer selection.  Plan on waiting 20 mins for your pizza.  It takes time for greatness.

name: Danielle Chaney
text: This location is a lot of fun and the food at all Mellow Mushroom locations is phenomenal!

name: John Shaw
text: My family and I enjoy coming mellow mushroom. Everyone enjoys the laid back environment and unique pizza selection.  The staff is always friendly and willing to adjust any pizza or calazone to our liking.  They also have a military discount, which is just another good reason for me to go.

name: Molly Anderson
text: Service .... A+++!  I have worked in the  industry for years so I know good service. My boyfriend and I came in on a Wednesday Evening.  IMMEDIATELY after entering we were kindly greeted by 3 hosts. They were so sweet and kind. Our server ( …More

name: matt whitacre
text: Family night out in the town of New Albany.  Mellow mushroom always has very tasty hummus to start the meal off.  It was busier than normal so the main food came out a little later than normal.  My wife enjoyed the potatoe and bacon pizza and the calzone I had was great.  I would recommend getting a pie here sometime.

name: Dylan Baldwin
text: Fantastic food, very kind staff, constantly fantastic character. They charge fair rates and the food quality is excellent. Great work.

name: Jerry Mudd
text: Pizza was really good. Nice selection of beers.

name: Karen Villagran
text:
Excelent place, so yummy and they use paper straws 👍
Many options for drinks and vegan cheese

name: Kim C
text: Was a very cozy place. Great for small or big groups. Our waiter was super nice and very friendly. They have eco-friendly straws as well! Which is a BIG plus for me, love it. The pizza is good. I would say it's about average, BUT that's …More

name: David Foster
text: Fantastic pizza. They have all of the traditional styles and they have unusual and unique pizzas as well. Highly recommend this place for the pies

name: Linann Kay Knodel Duren
text:
Ask for Marta.... their BEST SERVER! Conscientious and pleasant. Food fairly tasty, if it's not right, the management works hard to please.
Lunch is good: pizza slice and a salad. Special occasions, request the cookies: all are yummy, and big... big enough to share.

name: Jamie Hopps
text: The BEST melts vegan cheese in town! Their salads are amazing as well.

name: Mary Brandenburg
text: My family and I went to this restaurant and what a big variety of food to choose from. It's a very popular restaurant because there was quite a line to get in. The food was perfect. The staff was very helpful and courteous. We weren't …More

name: Justin Coffman
text: This is always a great place to go. Great fun casual atmosphere.  The pizza is always a favorite.  The calzone was ok.  Too heavy on the bread for my taste.

name: Tenshi DaStrange
text: Great service and some of the best pizza I have ever had! Amazing!

name: Andrew Houlne
text: The service, and atmosphere were great as always.  I had the Tempeh sandwich, but it didn't wow me. Thought it could have used more lettuce and sauce as it seemed a bit dry.

name: Jonathon Lotut
text: Wow! Service was great! Was greeted nicely and our server was really kind and had some good opinions on the menu. Food was good service was better! Will come back again for sure since I just moved to the area recently and I love pizza.

name: Julie Johnson
text: Great pizza choices. Family fun. Really like the long booths.

name: Elizabeth Ankrom
text: I wish I would’ve taken pictures of the wonderful food we had but we were all starving LOL so instead I will just say thank you from the bottom of my heart for putting us in a side room so that we could spend some time together celebrating …More

name: Lynn Hinger
text: You g ok tra see this place. Pizzas are hand tossed and very good.

name: Michael Fahey
text: Nice big bar, great pizza and drinks.

name: Jana Labean
text: I had a gluten free pizza and my hubby had a calzone, both were fantastic. This is the first time we ate at Mellow Mushroom, they are amazing with gluten free, the staff is educated and trained about cross contamination, they did a fantastic job. Very yummy

name: Andrew Steiner
text: I thought the pizza was excellent. I got a 4 topping regular crust with pep, green peppers, jalepeno and mushrooms. The ingredients were all great quality. The reason i am giving 3 stars is because this one large pizza was $29 bucks, which seemed very expensive.

name: Michael Smith
text: Imaginative menu, great service, awesome beer list

name: Dan Laub
text: Love the food! However, due to bad service we likely won't be going back. Here's a suggestion for management: it's a really bad idea to give 40 pizzas for a catering job priority over dining room customers at 6:00 on a Friday. If we'd have …More

name: melanie Paglione
text: Delicious food, great service, neat decorations

name: K Evan Thompson
text: Italian sub was awesome! Needs a pinball machine.

name: Fletcher Chmara-Huff
text: As chains go, Mellow Mushroom has some unique offerings. Local beers and specials are available, using the original Georgia based menu as a start.

name: Kasey Wilson
text: Okay hands down, best customer service. I wanted their vegan pizza but didn't have good customer service last time but new management is doing a good job! Customer service is everything!

name: Randi Daniels
text: My boyfriend had never been to Mellow Mushroom before and I haven’t been in years. My only experience was at the Dublin location. When we first got there, I was disappointed to see how small the specialty pizza menu has gotten. Then, we …More

name: R W
text: I LOVE The Mellow Mushroom! I was in Columbus for almost 2 weeks for work, and had the chance to visit all 3 locations in the area. This is by far the best one! New, nice decor, and the staff is great. I had the same waitress - Kaczlyn …More

name: Denise Setmayer
text: We had an amazing experience using Mellow Mushroom for catering our work event yesterday. Not only was their food amazing, they went above and beyond to help us with last minute plans for their delivery person to pick up a birthday cookie …More

name: Dominique C
text: Staff friendly and food is amazing

name: Jacklyn Tellez
text: The food was delicious and was received in a timely manner. Our waitress was very kind and attentive.

name: Buckingham
text: The food is great and the staff are very friendly and helpful

name: Lee Slatzer
text: Great pizza! Excellent crust and tasty specialty pizzas. Buffalo chicken pizza is outstanding. Great atmosphere and decor.

name: Bethany Brown
text: The atmosphere was neat and different with all the psychedelic paintings on the walls. The people were friendly and the pizzas were very tasty and fresh. I like the long list of craft beers they have as well.

name: Jason Gleim
text: Great atmosphere and really great pizza. We have visited this location a few times and have had great food and a great time every visit. The staff tends to be well trained but laid back making it a very casual atmosphere. The kitchen is an …More

name: Jordan Forry
text: Love their pizza and pretzel bites

name: Janet Collins
text: Great pizza. Service good.

name: Cameron DuelL
text: A good modern Pizza joint with a good drink menu as well as lots of other eats to enjoy  definitely will not be disappoint

name: Adrienne Jones
text: Great service from the bar, amazing assortment of beers on tap!

name: Jackie Buday
text: Always delicious and the service is always great. I love coming here.

name: Garrett Colburn
text: Good food, reasonable prices, and glad they offer vegan options.

name: Scarz Playz
text: Service was great and so was the atmosphere, my only problem the food made me sick which could have been my fault.

name: Cheryl Moore
text: This was our 4th visit to this location.  We always go after a young ones dance recital.  The food is always exceptionally good and plentiful!  Love those pretzel bites with beer cheese and marinara.   All in our group had pizza - pepperoni …More

name: Eric Antalek
text: Service is a little on the slow side, but the pizza is quite good.

name: Nathan Racz
text: The pizza was excellent. The crust was the best part being crispy and chewy. The restaurant had the classic pizza parlour vibe from the 70s.

name: Scott Williams
text: Great service. Feels like hanging out with friends when you are there. Prices are a bit high, but it's new albany

name: Emily Burke
text: Great food. Great service. Great atmosphere. Very clean. The hostess was away from her post when we walked in, but she quickly made eye contact and showed urgency to greet us. Victoria was a stellar server. She was attentive and personable …More

name: Andrew Thomas
text: Great atmosphere, great food, great service

name: Drew Shafer
text: Very cozy atmosphere with a rustic look, and a nice looking bar. Sat at the bar, service was very prompt and friendly. The bruschetta was amazing and a nicer plating/presentation than would be expected at a pizza place. The House Special …More

name: Susanne Laforest
text: Best pizza.  A must to try.

name: Dawn Green
text: The staff did an excellent job accommodating our large group. We were there for my friend's birthday. The food was delicious. The bartender did a great job with our drinks.

name: Mary Jane McMullin-Plute
text: First time there. IMO Food okay. Server was a little distracted. Blamed on a busy lunch service. This is not an excuse it's lazy.

name: Paul Alexander
text: Really good and creative styles of pizza with a funky view. The beer selection is fantastic! Don't be afraid to try something new. The place gets busy pretty quick so come early or be ready to wait. Service is fairly quick so check out the menu before you come so you can be ready to order.

name: Chris Rector
text: Excellent pizza and staff, even better music choice. Good for lunch and all around good vibes.

name: Ritesh Sharma
text: Good pizza, sometimes the wait is long. Good selection of drinks. Lot of space.

name: Briana Brooks
text: Cazlynn (sorry for the spelling if it's wrong) was an amazing waitress. Very attentive and polite. Made me and my husband feel welcome. We enjoyed spending our 4th of July dinner at mellow mushroom.

name: Jonathan Cohen
text: Expensive but delicious. I had the potato pizza and it came out hot and looking great. It tasted even better. The waitress was very nice and we didn't have to wait for a table.

name: Raven Gaston
text: Always good. Love their vegan cheese and tofu options

name: Michelle Shoemaker
text: Delicious!  Wide variety of unique food items. Will definitely return to try some other dishes with my family.

name: Charles Wentzel
text: Pizza was fantastic.

name: Livvy S
text: Atmosphere was intriguing and upbeat. Food was good and service was quick.

name: Michael Lemons
text: Great food! Incredible staff! Fantastic craft beer selection!

name: K Bobo
text: First time trying it, and probably the last.  For $70 pizza, it should be the best.  The crust is great, if you like it chewy and thick.... but that's ALL you eat.  And for toppings being $3.50 each... there should be more.  There's like 4 …More

name: Chad Clark
text: Decent pizza but very slow service

name: Darren Hale
text: great pizza cool atmosphere

name: Anthony Kantor
text: Good food usually.  Take out experience often leaves something to be desired.  Usually show up a bit early, almost always I am forgotten about and have to go up and ask about the food.  Last time was told they would bring it to me, 30 min …More

name: Jill
text: Love the Holy Shiitake pizza and the option to order different toppings on half it you want to try different ones.  The place is super loud though. Disappointed that our server didn't announce Happy Hour items as it would have been helpful.

name: J S
text:
F
Good pizzas but kinda slow. But really good pizza!

name: Jeffrey Wilkey
text: Great pizza and service tonight.

name: Sherri Kingrea
text: Great food and service.  Just wish they had low calorie dressing for the salads!  Chicken wings are good but super tiny!  Pizza & pretzels are phenomenal!

name: Ryan Misiunas
text: Good food but service was very slow.

name: Stephen Woodard
text: Mellow Mushroom may be my favorite pizza. Their pizza crust is fabulous and they have a myriad of gourmet offerings and plenty of toppings if you wish to build your own. Recommended.

name: Chris Conley
text: Went to the New Albany Ohio location. Awesome environment. Great Pizza. Little on the pricey side.

name: Chris Truax
text: New menu.  Quality hand tossed pizza.  Also had a balloon lady to entertain the tables.

name: Dustin Caldwell
text: Had the steak and cheese hoagie.  Tasted great, service was solid.

name: Danielle Molden
text: Only getting that 3rd star bc they had a ballon lady come by and make the kids ballon animals. We ordered a pizza and that came out fairly quick but the kids mac n cheese was another 10 mins. And it seems  like the last order of pretzel …More

name: Manda Thaxton
text: Great pizza! We went for the princess dinner, the princess spent much less time with my daughter than she did at the other tables and we were the last to see her, kinda sad for my daughter who waited oh so patiently, but the mellow mushroom people were fantastic and I can't hold that against them

name: Enoch Moeller
text: Delicious pizza and fantastic beer selection, as always.

name: Mark Eyer
text: Holy Shitake! That was good!

name: Lucas Rogers
text: Party of 40 was knocked out of the park! Shout out to Hunter and Maggie! Always request them and tip huge! Always had a new drink, 11 pizzas, all amazing, not a one burnt! And this is all while the rest of the place was slammed!

name: Kenzie Lynn
text: Good beer selection, family friendly. Solid pizza. We had one of the vegetarian specialty pizzas with pesto, it was great! Be sure to make a reservation for a Friday or Saturday night, or be prepared to wait!

name: tom robinson
text: I've never been to a Mellow Mushroom where the pizza wasn't excellent and this place doesn't disappoint. One of the best pizzas you'll get. Highly recommend!

name: Greg Swearingen
text: Great atmosphere and pizza

name: Denise 1965
text: Good food good service

name: Kathryn Poe
text: Really great options, chill setting, and good drinks. Also wonderful service!

name: İley Parisi
text: Amazing vegan pizza. The shitake mushroom is the best I've ever had!

name: J B
text: I ordered two large pizzas for take out last night. It took 45 minutes when the host said it would be 25 minutes. After I got home I realized one pizza was burnt. I was to tired and aggravated to call back and wait for a replacement :(

name: cj athey10
text: Pizza and appetizers were very good.  Atmosphere and service was top notch in a casual setting. Will definitely return.

name: Luke Sherman
text: THERE PIZZA IS OUT OF THIS WORLD. So good and so many wild options!!! It has such a nice area to eat at too

name: Jennifer Mullins
text: It took a while to get our food, but once recieved it was very good and as ordered.

name: Tim Brown
text: Great food and service

name: Michael Nielsen
text: good pizzas as you want them, a bit expensive thougg.

name: Norma Stepp
text: Great pizza, great service!!

name: Tyson Drexel
text: Great serve and pizza

name: John Horst
text: We were a large group, and it was a challenge for them. Food was good, and our entrees were mostly hot and ready. That was the challenge, but service was very good.

name: Tara Alexander
text: The food and customer service was great!

name: Jaimie Zydorczyk
text: Food is great but waitress Stephanie not so great. If drinks are empty don't just stand talking to another server saying "looks like all the tables are good." 🤦‍♀️

name: Mark Eva Casey
text: Nice atmosphere.... we got waters, 1 medium and 2 small pizzas and 3 ceasar salads for $75. It was good but not THAT good.

name: Joe Sadelfeld
text: Great balloon making lady,  good food.

name: Will Brown
text: Great place to take kids! They give the kids dough to play with while they make your pizza!

name: Lisa Brooks
text: Pizza was awesome. Very friendly staff. We will definitely be back!

name: Rose Hawkins
text: Amazing food and service!

name: Christina Adams
text: Best pizza

name: OG2
text: Great atmosphere. Good food.

name: Krisi Gertz
text: Pizza good. It was fun to watch their chefs toss the dough!

name: Randall Whitted
text: The best Mellow Mushroom I've been to. Great location, great atmosphere, and always really good, unique pizza. Minus a star because they seem to get overwhelmed easily. Mellow Mushroom is never fast because of how they make their food, but …More

name: Daniel Kruk
text: Great location with really friendly staff! The pizza is good but nothing exceptional

name: Andrew Bottar-Dillen
text: Food is very good. Service is incredibly slow, and has been consistently so during all three visits this year. Must improve!

name: Susan Dye
text: It is always at the top for service, quality and the staff it's always on top of everything.

name: G. W. Wolfe
text: Loved our gathering here!

name: Melody Zomonski
text: This was our first visit to this location.  Service was good, pricing was reasonable..  Great presentation of the food.  The food was good, just not amazing like our visit to a different location.  Could have been our selection, we'll have to try something different the next time.

name: Stephanie Theurich
text: We waited 35 minutes for a table and over an hour for food. When food runner brought food it was luke warm, cold and some of the food was missing. Plates not cleared, refills not offered, no silverware, napkins.

name: louella noll
text: No wait to sit and good food. Service was fine and the resteraunt was clean.

name: Andrew Barrick
text: We had a business lunch here with the employees and the service was quick and efficient and highly enjoyable with Excellent pizza!

name: Linda Allison
text: It was just "ok". I was expecting it to be something special because I had heard so much about it.  Service was slow.  Pretzel bites were more like garlic bread nuggets.  Took a long time for pr pizza.  It wasn't bad,  but certainly was not as good as I was expecting.

name: Lori Marteney
text: Okay.  A little pricey and the pizza was good.  The restaurant was very nice.

name: Brian Watson
text: Pizza and atmosphere were great. We were in town and met up with a friend from work and had a pretty large party. Waiter was quick, attentive, and friendly. Food was excellent.

name: Lola Smith
text: My parents and myself went to this restaurant for dinner on a Sunday night. The restaurant was pretty slow but we still waited 50 MINUTES for 1 small pizza and 1 large pizza!! Our server didn’t even come over to explain anything or let us …More

name: Jordan Hull
text: Pizza was great and the atmosphere was unique and interesting.

name: Amy Smerecky
text: The pizza and salads are always great!

name: Scott Boyles
text: Great pizza, good selection of beers

name: Ron Caldwell
text: Atmosphere and the food was excellent. The  service was top notch, the servers do not miss a thing that you may need on the table.

name: Regis Martin-Fuller
text: Very good family restaurant,  many screens to catch sports. Larger tables.

name: Pramod Lohani
text: Awesome pizza, me amd my friend really enjoyed the dine in experience. We had to wait for 45 minutes as there was a waiting at the restaurant. Very neat and well maintained place. Our hostess checked with us if we are doing ok or if we need anything. Very good service and experience.

name: Steven Selman
text: Always great service.  Personable.  Efficient. The pizza rocks!  A few clemson fans work here and that stinks, but other than that... awesome work!  Go Gamecocks :)

name: John Kessler
text: Good pizza

name: Roughrebel
text: Good food..a little over priced for what i got. But all in all a good place to eat.funky atmosphere.

name: David Thomas
text: We've been to the New Albany Mellow Mushroom several times and the result has always been disappointing. Family visiting from out of town wanted to go, we tried to warn them but we still ended up going last night. We had a party of 6, we …More

name: Samual Hiltsman
text: Good food good pizza

name: Joyce Weinberger
text: A great place to eat. Delicious food, great service and a very nice relaxing atmosphere. Look forward to visiting again.

name: Jason Krantz
text: Pizza and service were top notch!

name: Mr. Baker
text: My burger was excellent the potatoes that came with it were too  burned for me other than that was great.

name: Jaime IV Suárez Herrera
text: My second time here and, eventhough they changed the pizza menu I must confess they are the best in Columbus. It is what I call a real pizza. Love this place so 5 stars

name: James Carson
text: Great Ceasars salad and slice of pizza

name: Ivan Dusper
text: We stopped in here for lunch for the first time and had a great experience. The service was top notch and Taylor went above and beyond to make sure we were happy customers. Pizza was outstanding and the beer selection was good. Will definitely go back.

name: Vikas Argod
text: The Cosmic Karma pizza was good..

name: ash hathaway
text: Great atmosphere and great food

name: Steek006 Kas
text: The service was very nice and my food was pretty good. The minor issue I had was with kid food that looked like Catholic School food. So we could not get the kids to eat it. But otherwise very. Nice.

name: Darren Price
text: Good food, solid service.  A little slow, but the server did tell us ahead of time it might take a while.  Solid beer selection.  A good choice for families with a lot of kids.

name: Regina Breda
text: Food was very good, server wanted to be somewhere else!

name: Stanley Hortz
text: My cheese steak sandwich was dry and tasteless. Our server Chloie was wonderful.

name: Deidra Dotson
text: Food was attractive...service was well.

name: Andrew Patterson
text: Great beer selection and good food. Great place to watch a hockey game at.

name: T Russo
text: Fun atmosphere and good food

name: Lisa row-taylor
text: Only 2nd time here, service has been lacking both times. Didnt get my drink til meal almost over. Watched waitress just stand with other servers. Burger really greasey.

name: Bill Garbrandt
text: Can't roll through New Albany without the tractor beam pulling us in for a pie.

name: Christopher.
text: Good pizza place, serving all your Italian favorites! I enjoy every meal at Mellow Mushroom. Do not skip the appetizers!

name: Kimberly King
text: First time and the pizza was amazing

name: Aaron White
text: Great pizza. Vegan options. The crust is amazing.

name: Megan Saccomen
text: Great service! Great food!

name: Andrew Riederer
text: Great food - the pizza and pretzels are outstanding.  Good beer selection, both on draft and bottles.  Staff is friendly.  The restaurant is clean.   Decor and atmosphere are typical Mellow Mushroom - funky and fun.  Prices are on the high side, but the food is worth it.

name: Mason Edward
text: Best pizza place I've been to

name: Ryan Wahl
text: Jolly damn this was a delicious treat! Service was excellent and the pizza was fantastic. Very reasonably priced and there was no wait when we arrived at 6:00pm on a Friday. We will definitely be back to try some different pizzas.

name: Grace Strodtbeck
